lsmr.vendingmachine.simulator

Class SelectionButtonSimulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • lsmr.vendingmachine.simulator.AbstractHardware<SelectionButtonSimulatorListener>
      • lsmr.vendingmachine.simulator.SelectionButtonSimulator

  • public class SelectionButtonSimulator
extends AbstractHardware<SelectionButtonSimulatorListener>
    Represents a simple push button on the vending machine. It ignores the enabled/disabled state.
